uiDesc: A clean and modern ecommerce UI designed to make shopping simple and enjoyable. It features intuitive navigation, attractive product displays, and layouts that keep users engaged and encourage purchases.

A showcase of my website projects built with Vue, WordPress, Webflow, and more. Each project demonstrates my skills in creating designs, developing functionality, and crafting engaging user experiences.
One of my first UI designs, created to put all my UI/UX learnings into practice. This project helped me explore design principles and improve my skills through hands-on experience.
A UI for showcasing NFT items on the blockchain. I created this project in 2022 inspired by my interest in crypto, turning that fascination into a website design experiment.
